thread.title: News Wrap: Bombing on Turkish peace rally stokes instability
thread.title_full: Video: News Wrap: Bombing on Turkish peace rally stokes instability | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: News Wrap: Bombing on Turkish peace rally stokes instability
text: In our news wrap Monday, political and ethnic tensions reached the boiling point in Turkey after deadly bombings over the weekend. Also, new battles erupted in Afghanistan as the Taliban attacked a new city.
